QuestData.Title: Spleendid!
QuestData.Description: Have you ever heard of food that cooks itself and stays hot forever? Dare to dream, I say!$B$BBut maybe it's not a dream at all! Outside the fortress, near the lava pools and streams, you can find beasts that thrive in the sizzling heat. They're called felfire diemetradons.$B$BThe dwarves around here tell me that those diemetradons have the tastiest spleens ever and that the spleens practically come pre-cooked! Bring me those spleens and I'll give you some coin.$B$BStart your search directly east of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gnomus at Wildhammer Stronghold in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to recover 8 Felfire Spleens.
QuestData.RewardText: <Gnomus hungrily grabs at the spleens.>$B$BHere's your coin as promised. I'll call for you if I need more spleens.$B$BSo delicious... I dare say that they are 'spleendid!'
